comment._content: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle, the creator of Sherlock Holmes: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arthur_Conan_Doyle

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: It is, indeed, that Conan Doyle. The LC Prints & Photographs Division has a corresponding photographic print from the Bain News Service (see: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/cph.3b44212 ). The print bears the date stamp "Jan. 27, 1913," so it has to have been taken before then. We'll add some name and date information to the description and reload it to Flickr. Thanks!
